titleStmt.title: Dr. Wild's poem. In nova fert animus, &c, or, A new song to an old friend from an old poet, upon the hopeful new Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Wild, Robert, 1609-1679.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "We are all tainted with the Athenian-itch,".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
